message.content:
Figma is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool that allows users to create, edit, and share interactive designs for websites, mobile apps, and other digital products. It provides a range of features for creating wireframes, mockups, and high-fidelity designs using a drag-and-drop interface, as well as tools for collaborating with team members in real-time.

Figma is popular among designers and developers due to its ease of use, wide range of features, and ability to integrate with other development tools. It also offers a free plan that allows users to create and share designs up to 1GB in size, as well as paid plans for more advanced features and team collaboration.
